name: Alter Ego (itch) (Demaker)
description:
Disclaimer: This game has no music or sound effects... I apologize for the inconvenience.

Submission for Retro Jam! I followed the theme to an extent. Every time you summon your Ego, you lose a set amount of HP.

This is the first ever game I made, as well as my first ever game jam game! I hope you all enjoy the concept I made for this project.

This game was heavily inspired by Atlus' Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3. 

You can download this game's rom to play it on a Game Boy or a Game Boy emulator, as well as play it straight from the browser! Any feedback is much appreciated!

Controls (also in the README.md)-

Up - Up Arrow / W  

Down - Down Arrow / S  

Left - Left Arrow / A  

Right - Right Arrow / D  

A - Alt / Z / J  

B - Ctrl / K / X  

Start - Enter  

Select - Shift 

I would like to thank Aseprite for their awesome program that helps making pixel art easier. I would also like to thank the creators of GB Studio for making such a great and easy to use game engine!
